plist.dict:
Disabled
Label org.nuclos.${server.name} OnDemand
ProgramArguments
${server.home}/bin/launchd.sh
RunAtLoad <${server.launch.on.startup}/> ServiceDescription Nuclos (${server.name}) StandardErrorPath ${server.home}/logs/launchd.stderr StandardOutPath ${server.home}/logs/launchd.stdout UserName root
